text: For I know that, after my death, you will do wickedly and will quickly turn aside, form the way that I have commanded you, and evils shall come upon you in the latter times, when you shall do evil in the sight of the Lord, to provoke him by the works of your hand.

segments.text: For I know that, after my death, you will do wickedly and will quickly turn aside, form
the way that I have commanded you, and evils shall come upon you in the latter times, when
you shall do evil in the sight of the Lord, to provoke him by the works of your hand.
